name: Black Hole Solitaire Premium
description:
Play this fantastic Black Hole Solitaire Premium. This is a Deluxe edition.

This game features 2 different variants and 4 leaderboards.

To win, all the cards must be discarded into the Black Hole.

Enhance your experience by customizing your card set with 3 different combinations of front to choose from.

NB: we have many other solitaire, strategy, word or action games in the App store.
